# InvalidMAV2AccountType

Initializes a new instance of the error message with a default message indicating that the provided ma v2 account type is invalid.
:::note
`InvalidMAV2AccountType` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for all supported methods.
:::

## Import

```ts
import { InvalidMAV2AccountType } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Parameters

### type

`string`
The invalid ma v2 account type that was used
